channel.title: Softwares on Kaspar Rufibach
channel.description: Recent content in Softwares on Kaspar Rufibach

item.title: github respository for different analysis methods for principal stratum estimands motivated by the principal ignorability assumption
item.description: Bj√∂rn Bornkamp, Kaspar Rufibach, Jianchang Lin, Yi Liu, Devan Mehrotra, Satrajit Roychoudhury, Heinz Schmidli, Yue Shentu, Marcel Wolbers (2020): Principal Stratum Strategy: Potential Role in Drug Development

item.title: github respository for MIRROS clinical trial design
item.description: Kaspar Rufibach, Dominik Heinzmann, Annabelle Monnet (2019): Integrating Phase 2 into Phase 3 based on an Intermediate Endpoint While Accounting for a Cure Proportion - with an Application to the Design of a Clinical Trial in Acute Myeloid Leukemia

item.title: R package: bpp
item.description: Kaspar Rufibach, Paul Jordan, Markus Abt (2016): bpp: Computations Around Bayesian Predictive Power

item.title: R package: SurvRegCensCov

item.title: R package: logconcens
item.description: Dominic Schuhmacher, Kaspar Rufibach, and Lutz Duembgen (2011): logconcens: Maximum likelihood estimation of a log-concave density based on censored data

item.title: R package: logcondiscr

item.title: R package: biostatUZH
